00047    template<typename TypelistT>
00048    class TVariant
00049    {
00050       template<typename VisitorT, typename VariantT>
00051       friend typename VisitorT::return_type staticVisit(VisitorT&, VariantT&);
00052       
00053    public:
00054 
00055       // FIXME make sure not to be able to add the same type multiple times
00056       typedef TypelistT tTypelistType;
00057 
00058       enum { unset = 0 };
00059 
00084       template<typename T>
00085       struct typeIdOf
00086       {
00087          enum { value = Private::TypeListAlgos::Find<T, tTypelistType>::value + 1 };
00088       };
00089 
00090    private:      
00091    
00092       typedef Private::TVariantHelper<
00093          typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<0, tTypelistType>::type,
00094          typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<1, tTypelistType>::type,
00095          typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<2, tTypelistType>::type,
00096          typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<3, tTypelistType>::type,
00097          typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<4, tTypelistType>::type,
00098          typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<5, tTypelistType>::type,
00099          typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<6, tTypelistType>::type,
00100          typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<7, tTypelistType>::type,
00101          typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<8, tTypelistType>::type,
00102          typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<9, tTypelistType>::type,
00103          typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<10, tTypelistType>::type,
00104          typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<11, tTypelistType>::type,
00105          typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<12, tTypelistType>::type,
00106          typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<13, tTypelistType>::type,
00107          typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<14, tTypelistType>::type
00108       > tHelperType;
00109 
00110    public:
00111       
00112       enum { size = Private::TypeListAlgos::SHBMax<tTypelistType, Private::SHBSizeFunc>::value };         
00113       enum { alignment = Private::TypeListAlgos::SHBMax<tTypelistType, Private::SHBAlignFunc>::value };   
00114 
00118       inline
00119       TVariant()
00120          : mIdx(unset)
00121       {
00122          // NOOP
00123       }
00124 
00128       inline
00129       ~TVariant()
00130       {
00131          try_destroy();
00132       }
00133 
00139       template<typename T>
00140       explicit
00141       TVariant(const T& t);
00142 
00149       template<typename T>
00150       TVariant& operator=(const T& t);
00151 
00158       bool operator==(const TVariant& rhs) const;
00159 
00166       inline
00167       bool operator!=(const TVariant& rhs) const
00168       {
00169          return !(*this == rhs);
00170       }
00171 
00177       inline
00178       TVariant(const TVariant& v)
00179       {
00180          construct_from(v);
00181       }
00182 
00189       TVariant& operator=(const TVariant& v);
00190 
00194       void reset();
00195 
00210       template<typename T, typename InplacerT>
00211       void reset(InplacerT arg);
00212 
00216       template<typename T>
00217       void reset();
00218 
00224       template<typename T>
00225       T* get();
00226 
00232       template<typename T>
00233       const T* get() const;
00234 
00240       inline
00241       bool isEmpty() const
00242       {
00243          return mIdx == unset;
00244       }
00245 
00252       inline
00253       signed char getTypeId() const
00254       {
00255          return static_cast<signed char>(mIdx);
00256       }
00257 
00258 
00259    private:
00260 
00262       void try_destroy();
00263 
00265       void construct_from(const TVariant& v);
00266 
00269       int mIdx;
00270 
00272       typename std::tr1::aligned_storage<size, alignment>::type mData;
00273    };

00278 
00279    template<typename TypelistT>
00280    template<typename T>
00281    inline
00282    TVariant<TypelistT>::TVariant(const T& t)
00283       : mIdx(typeIdOf<T>::value)
00284    {
00285       DSI_STATIC_ASSERT((Private::TypeListAlgos::Size<tTypelistType>::value > 1));//, a_variant_must_contain_at_least_two_elements);
00286       DSI_STATIC_ASSERT((Private::TypeListAlgos::Find<T, tTypelistType>::value >= 0));//, given_type_is_not_element_of_variant_maybe_use_explicit_cast);
00287 
00288       ::new(&mData) T(t);
00289    }
00290 
00291 
00292    template<typename TypelistT>
00293    template<typename T>
00294    TVariant<TypelistT>&
00295    TVariant<TypelistT>::operator=(const T& t)
00296    {
00297       DSI_STATIC_ASSERT((Private::TypeListAlgos::Find<T, tTypelistType>::value >= 0)); // given_type_is_not_element_of_variant_maybe_use_explicit_cast
00298 
00299       if (mIdx == typeIdOf<T>::value)
00300       {
00301          *get<T>() = t;
00302       }
00303       else
00304       {
00305          try_destroy();
00306          mIdx = typeIdOf<T>::value;
00307          ::new(&mData) T(t);
00308       }
00309 
00310       return *this;
00311    }
00312 
00313 
00314    template<typename TypelistT>
00315    TVariant<TypelistT>&
00316    TVariant<TypelistT>::operator=(const TVariant& v)
00317    {
00318       if (&v != this)
00319       {
00320          try_destroy();
00321          construct_from(v);
00322       }
00323       return *this;
00324    }
00325 
00326 
00327    template<typename TypelistT>
00328    inline
00329    void TVariant<TypelistT>::reset()
00330    {
00331       try_destroy();
00332       mIdx = unset;
00333    }
00334 
00335 
00336    template<typename TypelistT>
00337    template<typename T, typename InplacerT>
00338    inline
00339    void TVariant<TypelistT>::reset(InplacerT args)
00340    {
00341       try_destroy();
00342 
00343       DSI_STATIC_ASSERT((Private::TypeListAlgos::Size<tTypelistType>::value > 1));//, a_variant_must_contain_at_least_two_elements);
00344       DSI_STATIC_ASSERT((Private::TypeListAlgos::Find<T, tTypelistType>::value >= 0));//, given_type_is_not_element_of_variant_maybe_use_explicit_cast);
00345 
00346       mIdx = typeIdOf<T>::value;
00347       args.template apply<T>(&mData);
00348    }
00349 
00350 
00351    template<typename TypelistT>
00352    template<typename T>
00353    inline
00354    void TVariant<TypelistT>::reset()
00355    {
00356       try_destroy();
00357 
00358       DSI_STATIC_ASSERT((Private::TypeListAlgos::Size<tTypelistType>::value > 1));//, a_variant_must_contain_at_least_two_elements);
00359       DSI_STATIC_ASSERT((Private::TypeListAlgos::Find<T, tTypelistType>::value >= 0));//, given_type_is_not_element_of_variant_maybe_use_explicit_cast);
00360 
00361       mIdx = typeIdOf<T>::value;
00362       ::new(&mData) T();
00363    }
00364 
00365 
00366    template<typename TypelistT>
00367    template<typename T>
00368    inline
00369    T* TVariant<TypelistT>::get()
00370    {
00371       DSI_STATIC_ASSERT((Private::TypeListAlgos::Find<T, tTypelistType>::value >= 0));//, given_type_is_not_element_of_variant_maybe_use_explicit_cast);
00372 
00373       if (typeIdOf<T>::value != mIdx)
00374          return 0;
00375 
00376       return (T*)&mData;
00377    }
00378 
00379 
00380    template<typename TypelistT>
00381    template<typename T>
00382    inline
00383    const T* TVariant<TypelistT>::get() const
00384    {
00385       DSI_STATIC_ASSERT((Private::TypeListAlgos::Find<T, tTypelistType>::value >= 0));//, given_type_is_not_element_of_variant_maybe_use_explicit_cast);
00386 
00387       if (typeIdOf<T>::value != mIdx)
00388          return 0;
00389 
00390       return (const T*)(&mData);
00391    }
00392 
00393 
00394    template<typename TypelistT>
00395    void TVariant<TypelistT>::try_destroy()
00396    {
00397       if (mIdx > 0 && mIdx < Private::TypeListAlgos::Size<typename TVariant<tTypelistType>::tTypelistType>::value + 1)
00398          tHelperType::destruct(mIdx, &mData);
00399    }
00400 
00401 
00402    template<typename TypelistT>
00403    void TVariant<TypelistT>::construct_from(const TVariant& v)
00404    {
00405       mIdx = v.mIdx;
00406 
00407       if (mIdx > 0 && mIdx < Private::TypeListAlgos::Size<typename TVariant<tTypelistType>::tTypelistType>::value + 1)
00408          tHelperType::construct(mIdx, &mData, &v.mData);
00409    }

00447    template<typename ReturnT = void>
00448    class TStaticVisitor
00449    {
00450    public:
00451 
00452       typedef ReturnT return_type;
00453 
00454    protected:
00455 
00456       ~TStaticVisitor()
00457       {
00458          // NOOP
00459       }
00460    };
00461 
00462 
00470    template<typename VisitorT, typename VariantT>
00471    inline
00472    typename VisitorT::return_type staticVisit(VisitorT& visitor, VariantT& variant)
00473    {
00474       return VariantT::tHelperType::eval(variant.getTypeId(), visitor, variant);
00475    }

00482 namespace Private
00483 {
00484 
00486 template<typename VariantT>
00487 class CEqualityVisitor : public TStaticVisitor<bool>
00488 {
00489 public:
00490 
00491    inline explicit
00492    CEqualityVisitor(const VariantT& var)
00493       : mVar(var)
00494    {
00495       // NOOP
00496    }
00497 
00498    inline
00499    bool operator()()
00500    {
00501       // never reached
00502       assert(false);
00503       return false;
00504    }
00505 
00506    template<typename T>
00507    inline
00508    bool operator()(const T& t)
00509    {
00510       const T* val = mVar.template get<T>();
00511       return val != 0 && *val == t;
00512    }
00513 
00514 
00515 private:
00516 
00517    const VariantT& mVar;
00518 };
00519 
00520 }   // end namespace

00522 
00523    template<typename TypelistT>
00524    inline
00525    bool TVariant<TypelistT>::operator==(const TVariant& rhs) const
00526    {
00527       Private::CEqualityVisitor<TVariant<TypelistT> > v(*this);
00528       return mIdx == rhs.mIdx && (mIdx == 0 || staticVisit(v, rhs));
00529    }
